name: nodewizard
description: This repo need to import when we start a new project

scripts.test2: npm run start-watch && npm run wp-server
scripts.test3parallal: npm run ins3 && npm run ins4 && npm run ins5
scripts.test4series: npm run ins3 & npm run ins4 & npm run ins5
scripts.ins: npm install --save express body-parser morgan mysql && npm install --save-dev nodemon && mkdir api\routes api\models api\controlers public api\views documentation\postManDocumentation documentation\apiDocumentation && echo node_modules > .gitignore && echo * text=auto > .gitattributes && npm run start

author: Aarif Husain
